title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model library.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node.js and browsers, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, packaged as a Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node affinity and autoscaling.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions collection that lets CI pipelines run local LLM steps via Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible deployments on NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for pipeline integration.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder components.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds local AI autocomplete powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client written in Rust with keyboard shortcuts and conversation history.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command for internal company bots.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI-assisted note writing using Ollama.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a tool for Claude Desktop and other MCP clients.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.
